SYN_BRONCH_4_1:
Indication: RLL mass.
Anesthesia: General.
Procedure:
- White light bronch: Endobronchial lesion RLL superior segment.
- Forceps biopsy x multiple. Cold saline/epi/lidocaine for bleeding.
- ROSE: ?Malignancy.
- EBUS: Stations 11L, 10L, 7, 4R, 10R, 11R visualized.
- Station 7 (>5mm) sampled (TBNA x4).
- ROSE: Adequate.
Complications: None.
